Enum AbstractCommand.SortDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AbstractCommand.SortDirection>

    AbstractCommand

    public static enum AbstractCommand.SortDirection
extends Enum<AbstractCommand.SortDirection>
    This enum is used to define the Sortdirection of a Field.
